A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It was a fun ride and we thoroughly enjoyed it! Maybe missed some opportunities with Luke\, but I loved all the character missions and thought the next movie was set up well. My son said the jump-to-lightspeed crash scene was the best thing he's seen in a sci-fi movie :) I was just sad it didn't come sooner\, before so many already died -- but they had to go\, it was a good storyline :)
